sentence.Network_en: Daphne was pursued by Apollo and was at last changed into a laurel tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 达夫尼被阿波罗穷追不舍,最后被变成一棵桂树.

sentence.Network_en: He sees himself going right to the top of the tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 他预见自己在同行中将无人可及。

sentence.Network_en: He was a huge man, built like an oak tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个大块头，结实得像棵橡树。

means.word_mean: 1. small tree of southern United States having dark red heartwood

auth_sentence.content: The very best fruit is tree-ripened and recently picked.
